name: last day on Earth (itch)
description:
Click on the bottom right corner to play in FULL SCREEN

If the game is unresponsive, CLICK INSIDE THE GAME WINDOW

ARROW KEYS to move, jump and double jump

How long can you survive?

Credits

  • Design and Development by Game Favorites
  • Background artwork by MamaNeZakon on itch.io
  • Character artwork by pixramen on itch.io
  • Music by darthdeus on itch.io
  • Sound FX by Duskbreaker on freesound.org
